title: 3 and Out - Aaron Rodgers Bombshell and NFL Draft Rounds 1-3 Reaction!!
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Aaron Rodgers Bombshell and NFL Draft Rounds 1-3 Reaction!!
description:
In this episode, John reacts to the Aaron Rodgers bombshell news that he doesn't want ever suit up for the Packers today , and if there's any way to salvage the relationship. He also gives his top takeaways from rounds 1-3 of the 2021 NFL Draft, including who got the best value, and his thoughts on the first round QB's!

Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
